faq.question: What is your return policy?
faq.answer: You can return any item within 30 days of purchase for a full refund. Please ensure the item is in its original condition and packaging.

faq.question: How long does shipping take?
faq.answer: Shipping times vary depending on your location. Typically, it takes 5-7 business days for domestic orders and 10-15 business days for international orders.

faq.question: Do you offer customer support?
faq.answer: Yes, we offer 24/7 customer support. You can contact us via email, phone, or live chat on our website.

faq.question: Can I change my order after it's been placed?
faq.answer: You can change your order within 24 hours of placing it. Please contact our customer support team as soon as possible to make any changes.

faq.question: Do you offer discounts for bulk purchases?
faq.answer: Yes, we offer discounts for bulk purchases. Please contact our sales team for more information on bulk pricing.
